name: Firefox dark devedition theme - less bright
description: This style changes the background color of the dark devedition theme (for Firefox's devtools) to less bright (3% darker).
additional_info:
After the recent dark theme refresh (https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1205330)  
I find that, the main background color in DevTools,  
mostly in Scratchpad (as a separate window) and Inspector, is too bright,  
as if the monitor's brightness is set way too bright.  

What I mean:  
https://i.imgur.com/O9zyg4o.png
https://i.imgur.com/ccFBhm6.png
This style changes that color (`#393F4C`) into `#313744` (3% darker)  
in all devTools (incl. Scratchpad as a separate window).  

If you prefer a darker/brighter background color,  
you may change the value of the --bg global variable in line 25 into one of the colors in lines 3-16.  

Thanks a lot to hideheader for his help here: [https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/comment/107383#Comment_107383.](https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/comment/107383#Comment_107383.)
